description.narrative: Brandix Lanka Limited (BLL or the Group) is an apparel manufacturer headquartered out of Sri Lanka and manufactures apparel primarily across four categories: Activewear, Casualwear, Intimate wear and Sleep & Loungewear. The Group employs 60,400 and has 28 manufacturing facilities across 5 countries, namely, Sri Lanka, India, Bangladesh, Cambodia and Haiti. Brandix Apparel Limited (BAL) is a wholly owned subsidiary of BLL and houses the manufacturing operations in Sri Lanka. The Project consists of financing the medium and long-term working capital requirements and capital expenditure of BALs existing operations in Sri Lanka.

At the project level, it is expected to support the Group sustain its operations to counter the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic whilst preserving jobs in Sri Lanka. The Project will also ensure continued production of high value added items and foreign exchange earnings to support the Sri Lankan economy. At the market level, the Project will help to protect exports growth and promote resilience whilst limiting disruptions along the domestic and global supply chain.
